title: Just Saying Hi
content: You probably won’t guess who this is — but I just wanted to say hi.

title: Thinking of You
content: I’ve been thinking about you lately. That’s all I wanted to say.

title: No Expectations
content: You don’t need to reply. I just didn’t want to keep this to myself.

title: Late Night Thought
content: It’s late, and somehow you crossed my mind again.

title: Unsaid Things
content: There are things I never had the courage to tell you directly.

title: Still Here
content: Even after everything, I still care more than you know.

title: Silent Support
content: If today was hard, just know someone out here is rooting for you.

title: Maybe Someday
content: Maybe someday you’ll know who I am. Today doesn’t have to be that day.
